review.title: “Cutting Edge Technology and ready for economy to rebound and take advantage of it's enablement”
review.pros: Pros – Challenging environment, room to grow, learning environment and great family atmosphere.
review.cons: Cons – As with many companies their are those interested in 'I' and not the team and need to maneuver around them.Tough economy to generate fee's and thus profits are down.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Remember operations is the backbone to your path to success in the future.
